participant_1.background:
I spend a lot of my free time researching and buying teapots.
I love to dress up but it's not all about the look, I like to keep my feet on the ground.
I want to drive my truck to the mountains and get some alone time.
I want to learn how to cook more healthy meals because I know fast food isn't good for my health.
i love to ride bikes.

participant_2.background:
I'm smart enough to know that weather doesn't care about my problems.
I'd brag about my loyal friends who have stuck with me through thick and thin.
i think i need botos soon.
I don't care what color my hair is as long as I can keep acting.
i am an award winning 4h member.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing great today. How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What do you do for fun?
I love to act! I'm an award winning 4H member, and I love to put on shows. What about you?
I love to ride my bike, and I'm really into teapots. I've been collecting them for years.
That's awesome! I love tea! What's your favorite kind?
I love green tea, but I also love flavored tea blends. How about you?
I love black tea, and I also love chai tea. I love the way they both smell!
I love chai tea too! It's so delicious.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go for a bike ride, or I might stay in and relax. What about you?
I'm not sure yet either. I might go to a movie, or I might just hang out with friends.
Sounds like you have a lot of options! I'm sure you'll find something fun to do.
